content.detailedDescription:
I was a security supervisor recently retired from the army. i was driving south about 10pm. i departed watsonville , ca heading towards monterey. as i approached the moss landing bridge i saw a flash above the power plant's east cooling tower. i pulled off the road on the north side of the bridge. i exited the car and observed the blue-white orb. it traveled at a uniform height due west at about 30mph, at an approximate height of 100ft or about 20ft above the tower. the incident was unique in that as the orb passed over the towers there was a series of 3 bursts that came from the orb. something fell from the orb trailing a white smoke. the object moved due west, out over the ocean through a clear starry sky until it vanished from sight. 

i continued my patrol to pebble beach and drove north again on hwy1. as i again approached moss landing about 1 hour after my previous sigbting, i saw a blue-white orb, about the size of a basketball moving due east at about 100ft. it was coming in from the ocean at about 30mph.

there were no bursts or emissions coming from the orb. neither was there any deviation in course or altitude. it entered the coast about 1/2 to 1/4 south of its exit point.

later that night the radio discounted the event as a meteorite entering the atmosphere.
content.summary: Blue-white orb traveling e-w then w-e

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my grandparents farm in the summer . wheel of fortune was on and i went out side to sneak a smoke . 
i was on the deck having my cigarette looking at the horizons , it was a clear moonless night . to the south east is a tower with a blinking light . and my focus was on that as i day dreamed about life in the hills that surrounded the family farm . behind the sound of the locust and crickets there was a shuttle humming from the dusk to dawn light . a faint light appeared over the trees in the direction i was looking maybe 20Â° left of the tower . i thought it was a plain or something and didn't really give it much thought . it stayed in that position for a few minutes slowly growing brighter with a dim white light. as i finished my smoke the new light had grown very bright . the him i had assossiated with the light was becoming loader and pulsating in a very rhythmic pattern . by the time my attention was fully on it , it was over the barn . it moved very low and slow . diomand shaped white lights on three corners , red lights numbering 4 at an angle at the aft . i gust stud and watched as it came down the hill over the barn and back up the hill . i went in side told me gp's about it and drew a scetch and a bread description of the event . have not told many people about this and this is why i file unknown.
content.summary: Iwas 14 or 15 i think, outside at grand parent's.Object appeared over trees on the hill south of the farm . it came down the hill over the barn lot and presided in a ne direction and disappeared from sight . it moved slow and produced a pulsating hum

content.detailedDescription:
On or about the night of 6/21/14, at around 2200 hours, my neighbor and i were standing on my front porch talking when i noticed the first object. at first, i thought it may be a flare and pointed it out to my neighbor.
at that point we noticed the object was moving from south to north, and turned toward the northwest. after traveling a short way the object then disappeared. two other objects became visible then, flying together with one trailing the other. they followed the same path as the first object and disappeared in the same place as the first.
content.summary: Three red-orange orbs.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was with my mother and brother on our way home from lawrenceburg to mt.Plesent.
2. all of the sudden the cars around us stoped and people got out and started to look up.
3. a ufo.
4. it was hovering in place for a few mins started to move south at a slow rate of speed then it took off so fast that 10 secs later cops by us were saying that it was over leoma.
5. i was only thinking how is the goverment going to cover this one up.
6. it took off so fast my mother couldn't keep up with it in her car.
content.summary: I was 7 years old at the time

content.detailedDescription:
We saw the first set of 2 bright lights while traveling north on the i15 in escondido around 10:00pm. they appeared to be around the san marcos area then caught another identical set to the west as we approached the 76. while watching them we saw 2 more blink on right next to it.
we pulled off the freeway at the 76 exit park and ride to watch them but lost them over the mountain, that's when we noticed the other one hovering over valley center (which is in the opposite direction to the east from where we were and approximately 5 miles) it hovered for about 5 minutes and then just instantly blinked out.
we tried to catch it on our cel phone camera but for some reason it didn't seem to show up on the camera. there were street lights across the freeway (close to us)that seemed to have the same level of brightness that you could see but the one we were trying to film wouldn't show up.
content.summary: Traveling north on i15 1t 10:00pm. 3 different sets of 2 lights to the west. stopped to observe. lost sight and noticed single hovering light 1 mile to the east in valley center, ca. observed for 5 minutes then light blinked out instantly.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside in front of my house to have a smoke and was sitting on are porch swing looking to the east at about 11pm or so and saw can't even describe it. it wasn't a flash or explosion it just appeared like a hole in space. it expanded open what looked to be very wide and then shrank and closed i didn't see anything come out of it.And even though i haven't seen it again since i've been watching that part of the sky ever since.Fyi i don.T drink or do drugs and sorry don't have any photo's but it happen to fast for any photo's to be taken
content.summary: There was no ufo it was more like a hole in space

content.detailedDescription: I was taken to a place where thier where many diff types off ppl than after being amazed i was weightless like and gitty ab out it,one girl said i was just like him when i first came we all where at a table,than a bright being took me down a hall that had two fire like staues but bright shinny with blueish green flame in them she took me to a room like a sana and their in a water like in ground jacuzzi. was the back of a skinless figure he had a name i'd like to keep that to my self for now the girl how took me to him was also skinless i could see her flesh as well as his. i made a video. rt after it happened its a bit more detailed. i felt abducted.Have seen some thing before huvering above my old house pre cell phone era and the person i was living with worked for a government contractor with a anacook chamber.I also heard one night on a night dive some thing loud working under. the ground and i was in a very populated bay.As reguried i can't say wher but u really don't wana know.  also had family tied to g      m lake. ...  i can't attached the drawings as they are not like any thing ever seen and i am a artist.Perhaps. after. i talk in person. to some one i will
content.summary: Cant explain what happen to meone mini was sitting,than awoke hard felt restrained.When i could see i looked around was sitting in a chair in front yard i was fully dressed felt confused and dazed,thought what happen to me? spoke to mr gray.

content.detailedDescription: In 1966 or 1967, when i was in the sixth grade, i was playing in my neighborâs front yard.  there were six of us running around, probably playing tag, when i saw three orbs below tree top level.  slightly smaller than a basketball in size, they were in a vertical row, spaced equally apart.  their color was like an orange-red fire light but the edge was not random as a flameâs would be but crisp like a ball. they were a little more than twice as high as my head about 12 feet up. the orbs were moving downward.  as each orb reached an invisible line it began to disappear until each one was gone. this happened fast and i ask the others if they saw âthatâ because i realized that they had stopped running around as i had.  i think that they did see it but they didn't seem to know it. i felt stunned. years later i tried to ask them about what they remembered that day but although they remembered something happened they didn't remember what.  at sixty years of age, i remember it clearly.  i would like to learn about other sightings like this one.  i have googled and investigated it for years and have found nothing.
content.summary: 3 bowling ball sized orbs, red-orange colored, vertical descent and disappearing as they passed an invisible line.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from the gym last night i noticed 2 bright yellow/orange orbs of light that turned into 3. i thought it was just a light in the distance but as i got closer it was obvious that it was something else. people were pulled over taking pictures of the lights above the i-5.
content.summary: 2 bright yellow/orange orbs of light that turned into 3.

content.detailedDescription: Wife and i were sitting outside on the back deck of a cabin, we had just arrived and unpacked and were ready to relax. we were just talking and i noticed what appeared to be a pulsating satellite traversing the sky. i didn't think anything of it because i've seen that before. but then the object stopped suddenly. i said to my wife, "did that satellite just stop moving?" just as i was, she was perplexed and said, "uh, yeah." she had noticed it, too. then the object began flitting around the patch of sky where it was located. we continued watching for a good half an hour. multiple times i focused on a star near it just in case it was some kind of optical illusion due to temperature variations in the atmosphere. however, the star i focused on appeared perfectly stationary while the other object continued to move randomly in the patch of sky. eventually my wife went inside and within 20 to 30 seconds of when she did, the object quit pulsating for about three minutes  before resuming it's previous activity. i watched for about another 10 minutes before finally accepting that i could not explain what i was seeing. in addition, the next night i made sure to look at the same patch of sky at the same time of the evening to see if there was any celestial object of similar brightness to what we had seen the night before. there was nothing. finally, one last thing that was very odd, at roughly 3 a.M. the night after the sighting, a smoke or carbon monoxide detector began blasting in the cabin. as soon as i got up and out of bed to see what was going on it stopped. i have no idea what we saw the evening before.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very bright, flickering, moved straight-line to a region of sky then stopped, then began moving in random directions

content.detailedDescription: Around 7:30 on monday evening, august 25th, 2014, i was in my backyard playing with my daughter. i glanced up and saw an object speeding just over dictionary hill, northeast of my home. it was approaching at about the top speed of a helicopter (which we see all the time). it had an odd shape and it turned, and it was silent. i realized that this wasn't a helicopter and got out my camera to shoot video. the object slowed and seemed to hover high over the shopping center east of my home. it rotated as though filming something. after about 10 minutes, the object was gone (no sign of departure). the object resembled an oil drum, a rusty, dingy gray color. it was tilted at an angle (maybe 30 degree or so) and its bottom was a pure bluish white light, like a halogen lamp in color. it had no wings, rotors, balloon, nor visible engine, so i don't think it was a drone (unless we have antigrav for them). at one point while i was filming a commercial jet flew by.
content.summary: Canister-shaped object flew to a spot then hovered perhaps 10 minutes

content.detailedDescription: Descripcion grafica, video sin editar
content.summary: Video

content.detailedDescription: I just want to get this off my chest.
content.summary: Unaware,scared, confused!`

content.detailedDescription: I have proof i tried to upload many times on yhis site whats going on
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: You can contact me

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I do not want any of my info out but i am sure it would interest you of what i've seen all my life and things that my wife has observe red with me. i have asked in my mind for hearts in the sky for my wife to have it appear as a cloud on a cloudless day and this is only one event that has happened. i have quit looking for, at them for several years but the sightings of the last year is where we were. i think that you would like to know what we've seen together. we've seen multiple shapes while out in the middle of nowhere in the desert. it's like they watch me. these events have been with me over 50 years i don't talk about it beings i want no publicity because i don't thought a nut but who knows what you may observe being near us. i'm sure they'll appear if i ask for signs of them. we have a lot of strange events plus mine before my wife was in my life
sincerely [name removed/cms/tg]
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I have had multiple over my lifetime many verifiable by wife i'm watching a show and you have had sightings in the same part area at the same time i was there this year in kc area and east coast

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were on the porch when his neighbors came down 4th st from west to east. they were pointing in the sky and tracking two glowing objects that were 'airplane' level in the sky. the objects were moving from west to east above the house we were at. i ran in the house and grabbed my cell phone off the charger and returned to see the objects had stopped one block east of the house we were at. i filmed the lights for thirty seconds before one of the lights flicked and disappeared. another twenty seconds later, the other light flickered and vanished.
i caught the footage on my phone but i watched the two objects with my eyes, and not through the phone so i was able to see the lights disappear but it almost looked as if they vanished upwards. on tape, it just looks like the lights dimmed to darkness.
content.summary: Two glowing lights in the long beach sky

content.detailedDescription:
On the first monday night in may, 1991, i was watching the news with my dog. the abc world news had just begun on tv when my dog began to growl. i had never seen her like that. she had a good nature and was playful. her hair suddenly stood up in a ridge along her back and she was crying and growling at the same time.

she jumped off the bed and went to the french door, with windows, that led from the bedroom to the backyard. she didn't paw to go out. instead she sat down and kept growling and crying with her fur raised. she kept shaking her head. i got up to see what what was frightening her.

when i got tot he door i noticed a screeching, buzzing, sound. it was similar to static. the tv blinked and so did the lights. it was actually hurting the dog. 

when i looked in the backyard it was just beginning to get dark, but there was still some light out. in the distance, just above the tree tops of the woods behind my house, i saw a circular light. it was hovering. i could tell it wasn't the moon, or anything natural, because it wobbled as it hovered. my dog was staring straight at it and growling viciously. i thought it was odd. i began to stare at it too.

as i watched, it was as if i couldn't take my eyes away. then i realized we were both unable to move. the static sound got louder but my dog couldn't shake her head. we were frozen in place. i was terrified. i wanted to run only i couldn't. 

the light changed direction. it fell down through the trees and took a path through the woods toward my house. it wove through the trees and got bigger and brighter. it hurt my eyes. it wasn't stopping it came straight for my door, about six feet off the ground. the light got so bright i thought my eyes would burn. then it was just gone.

i looked down at my dog. she was in exactly the same spot, drooling, and growling, but softer now. i was dizzy and disoriented. i was as if the light passed straight through us. i sat down on the floor to check my dog and she fell over and laid still, panting as if she'd been running. 

the whole event seemed a few seconds long. when i looked up at the tv, wheel of fortune was ending. an hour and a half had passed. the world news, the local news, and wheel of fortune had aired. i can't remember one thing during that time.

what is truly strange is that exactly one month later my dog vanished out of my backyard. i had to go out for a while. i left her outside. i had a five foot wooden fence around the yard. it was locked with a padlock. she wasn't a digger. i got home about nine pm and she was gone. the fence was locked. there was no fur on the ground. there were no holes in the yard. no one could have gotten over the fence, with a thirty-five pound dog, without a ladder. she was just gone.

i miss my dog, but mostly, it bothers me that i have no idea what happened during that time frame. i have severe headaches and strange dreams. i don't like to sleep at night. i have a strange rash all over my body and radiation has been found in the woods behind my house. what happened to me??
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Missing time episode

content.detailedDescription: I ws making photos of the water and i didn't notice the object till i saw the photo 20 minutes later. i didn't kow what was but i thought it was an ufo. later i was a little amazed for it. i have two photos. one whit three seconds separated in time. it's raw. one has the object. the other not. and then i send you another photo taken 12 seconds later where there is not again and another taken two minutes later more or less where there is a little black spot. you can see the information on the photo raw.
content.summary: I saw later on the photo

content.detailedDescription: We were on our way to go out to eat. we turned onto the main street in town and my mother and i noticed a glowing orange orb flying beside us about 40 feet in the air. it fallowed us all the way though town. we stopped at a 4 way stop and it stopped and waited until started moving again. when we pulled into the parking lot at the restaurant the orb stopped then when i got out of the car the orb went dark. after it went dark i could still see a black orb hovering over the parking lot.
content.summary: Flew beside us in the air.

content.detailedDescription: August 1973 or 1974. i drove over a field, coming from the north, in kaarst, west of dusseldorf in west-germany(west still at that time!) and saw this 'thing'  still above the houses in kaarst.  i thought it was an airplane and that my angle made it look like it stood still.  i stopped and looked.  it was just 'sitting' there and blinking.  it blinked with lights randomly. after so many minutes--maybe ten-- i got impatient and thought that if i drove around some houses i would get closer.  when i came around a corner the 'thing'  was gone.  i went to the police in kaarst and they  thought it was very funny. i tried to save my face by saying it was probably a blimp. they agreed. i spoke around 2001 to a professor of physics at princeton university about this 'thing'  and he thought i was very funny.
content.summary: A round object of the size of a modern airplane above the buildings in kaaarst, by neuss and dusseldorl in germany in early 1970s

content.detailedDescription: The year was 1975 and i was stationed at the lima missile launch faucility outside of sturgis sd/ vail, south dakota and bear butte south dakota.  bear butte has long been a religious spot for native americans.  i was a security police airman with the air force.  my partner and i were in-route to a missile silo just west of bear butte.  we were 1 mile west of bear butte when we saw a cigar shaped ufo with pulsating lights approaching the top of bear butte from the north.  the ufo stopped and hovered above bear butte for about 15 minutes and the slowly moved off toward the south, started to accelerate faster and then with-in seconds the ufo was gone.  no sound, no vapor trail, no sonic boom, just gone with-in seconds...
content.summary: Ufo arriving, hovering, then leaving above bear butte south dakota

content.detailedDescription:
1.) i had just been dropped off at home from a friends house. i was walking up the driveway when i just had the urge to look up.
2.) it was a cloudy night. so the bright light caught my eye.
3.) at first i just thought it to be a reflection from a neighbors house. but soon realised it was slowly descending.
4.) the object was like a bright solid light. as i continued to watch it, i moved to a better vantage point so i could try to judge what it was. that's when i noticed it was following me.
5.) i started walking down my street, again trying to make sure i was seeing what i was seeing. as i continued to walk down the street for about 100 feet, it had gotten within about 50ft from me. that's when i decided i'd take a picture. since that night, my cell phone hasn't worked right. at that point i decided i'd had enough fun for one night and quickly ran back to my house and up to my room. 
6.) having ran back so quickly i didn't look to see if i had been followed back. after i had gotten home and got myself calmed down, from my window i could hear a faint humming sound. i went to the window but didn't see the bright light. instead i saw a slightly hunched over being standing in my driveway behind the tailgate of our truck looking up at me. it remained there for about 5min. then just disappeared.
content.summary: Appeared above street. seemed to follow me as i walked.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving n on s meridian when i saw a craft coming from the west below tree level as it was going over the street it was risen up. it got above the trees and then it was gone. on the bottom of the craft it had a black mark on it. the rest of it was silver. the wind was coming out of the south at 15 to 20 mph.  the craft didn't have any problem with the wind. it look as big as a plane but no wings or nose. i looked down to see if any other cars was seen what i did and there was none. it was mothers day everyone was at lunch. i didn't know what i was seen but it had my attention till it took off. i try to understand what i saw but it just don't make since to me. as i pass where i seen it take off i looked in the field to make sure it just didn't land in the field. their is a field in the area it was coming from but i as so dumfounded i did t check it out. it took me this long to get the nerve up to report this.
content.summary: The craft move over the road west to east as it was risen up then it got to a certain height and then it took off and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was cleaning my glasses due to a drizzle rain while riding my bicycle on the bike trail. looked up to see if they were clear the object was in my line of sight. i was paralyzed with awe. i saw a disc shaped object then the object quicly took off fast. noiseless and it had small unrecognizable letter style markings a lighter grey color. as it moved away a blue colored fire like burst could be seen on the opposite side of the direction of movement of the object.It went south and very high in the sky until i could not track it with my eyes anymore.
content.summary: Was cleaning my glasses due to a drizzle rain while riding my bicycle on the bike trail. looked up to see if they were clear the object was in my line of sight. i was paralyzed with awe. i saw a disc shaped object then the object quicly took off fast.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in ocala, florida. i am a single female aged 47 yr's old. i'm a professional medical biller from home. i'm highly intelligent, and have no history of any major medical problems, mental illness, etc.. after this incident happened to me, my health declined dramatically, and my mental well being has now been questioned. when i say this, it is over my decline in health, which a doctor saying to me, you are not going to die!, but you act like it!, yet...All my hospitalizations since, have been legitimate medical reasons. i even had one doctor tell me, if he saw my medical report before and after this incident, he would have guessed me to be about 75 yrs old. yet this whole time...I cannot and have not ever disclosed to anyone what happened that night. it wasent until this morning when i was watching your show on the history channel and saw the story on that young woman in manhattan. i froze in fear! because the same type incident happened to me, only i was not sucked up in any craft.It was in the early morning hours. i'm usually in bed every night before 10am.I cant recall the exact time but i know it was after 1 am, because i do remember picking up my cell phone to look at the time, but then the screen went blank. i heard an apparent running type sound across my roof. i remember laying there very still "frightened" because i live alone. my first thought..Maybe a burglar was on my roof, but then i was thinking...Why my roof?? after about 30 seconds a blue beam of light "lasered" through my window pointing right on me. i couldn't scream, i couldn't move, almost like in a dream state, and all i could do was lay there paralyzed. the blue beam was directed right at my left rib area ( to this day..I still feel like "an object" something that does not belong in my left rib area). no more than about 3 minutes later i heard helicopters, more than one, flying right over my house. i did not have curtains on my blinds, and could clearly see they were flying so low i could see and hear the trees blowing almost like a tornado would. the helicopters were loud, at one point it felt like it was going to land on my roof. they even hovered over my house what felt like an eternity. all i could think inside my thought was...What is going on??...Are my neighbors hearing this too?..Are they able to get up and run out their houses to see what the commotion was??. me..I was paralyzed not only physically but in fear. i laid in my bed till it got light. by now i was able to "move my body". i remember saying to myself, should i ask a neighbor did they hear anything??, but i never did. i pretty much keep to myself, especially living alone. i blocked the whole incident out of mind in fear that i would be ridiculed , laughed at, and be labeled as a weirdo. in the next few days, i happened upon the article in my local newspaper "sightings of black hawk helicopters" flying low in our area reported!..Was there some military cover up, or flight training...Still a mystery.Regardless...Something was going on, whether it be due to a ufo chase by military, or whatever. you just don't see military flying here in this small town..Period! research my local papers--you will find it! when i saw that, i started to cry..Thank god i'm not the only one who witnessed or heard this.
but i never voiced my opinion, or told anyone what happened..To this day. all i can tell you...Something defiantly happened to me, this is not something i dreamed up.I have never recovered medically., and the first opportunity financially, i moved from that house.Never to look back. one thing i can tell...This is something i will never forget.
content.summary: {jd} i was asleep/i heard something run across my roof and a blue light pointing right directly at me..Not one minute later did i hear helicopters searching for whatever it was

content.detailedDescription: Me my wife and a friend was driving.When we seen an orange light we stopped we thought it was a plane crashing until it stopped for about 30 seconds enough time for.Me to take 2 pictures of it then took off
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: We were driving and seen a bright orang light

content.detailedDescription:
Monday aug 25,2014 
i had stepped outside for a smoke at 5:30 am pst when a light in the sky caught my eye. initially i thought it was a star or even a planet but within 5 secs it moved. it seemeed to me it was too large to be a plane, plus there were no flashing lights. not a helicopter. it was too far away for me to make out what it might be. as i watched it began to move more to the right of where i was wathing from. (it was in the sw horizon and moving in a northernly direction)although in general it remained in the south western horizon because it only moved briefly, but enough to actually see movement. i did'nt know what to think. what the heck was this?! then the object became very bright. bright-bright! like an arc welders arc glow. it began to move straight up and very fast. i watched it until it was gone, it disappeared into the sky. there were no clouds, the sky was clear and it was early enough to still be dark. all this happened within the span of 1.5-2.0 mins.

tuesday aug 26, 2014
the next morning i deliberately went outside at 5am pst to see if would reappear. it did.
this morning there were some wispy clouds, but not enough to hinder seeing the ufo/glowing object. this time i only saw it ascend and disappear.
content.summary: The object initially appeared as if a star, then it moved to the right and began to glow like an arc weld light and made a rapid ascent straight up to the sky and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Night hours range from 9:00pm-3:00am over 4 months object-s in same area will dart in random direction sometimes moving slower in linear directions then sometimes immediately vanishes and reappears in different spot
content.summary: For 4+ months saw 1 then noticed 2 more does not move with stellar movement stationary then bolts in random direction

content.detailedDescription: Last night (august 25th) at approximately 9:40-9:45 p.M. (pt) i went outside to our northern patio in rancho bernardo which has a direct and clear view of escondido, ca to smoke a cigarette and noticed two blazing lights on the horizon.  initially, i thought it was a fire on a hillside in the distance (5 miles or so away) but there are no mountains/hillsides in the area (of where the object hovered) and the "fire" was in the sky!  i was shocked.  i yelled for my husband (who had gone to bed) to come quickly and he watched it as well.  by the time (within a minute) he got out to the patio the "whatever" had become three lights...Two of them close to each other and the third above the two and to the left (west).  they were very elongated - nothing like a saucer shape and glowing a very bright orange.  looked like the color of fire.  the three had merged into one and then into two a couple of times. i tried to film them with my iphone but they were too far away.  this lasted at least 15-20 minutes and then - when it had merged into one object - disappeared into the clouds. a half hour (or so) later, i couldn't help but notice a weird streak (like a chemtrail in the sky (illuminated by the moon)...And the obvious helicopters coming from the south (towards escondido) to (no doubt) investigate.  today i will upgrade my video stuff and not ever be caught off guard.  this is my third ufo experience.  all three times were in the general area (lake hodges between rancho bernardo and escondido) in 1978, 2012 and last night.
content.summary: A blazing light which became three lights over escondido, ca

content.detailedDescription:
A pair of bright amber lights hovering in the rural area southwest of where murreta rd meets scott rd. may have also been visible to those in wildomar and the north side of murrieta. 

the lights were very bright, steady (not pulsating or flashint), and stationary - not typical of the frequent air traffic in the area. 

we noticed the lights to the southwest when we exited i-215 on newport rd heading westbound. when we reached murrieta rd, we headed south, and approximately 1 mile from scott rd we noticed what appeared to be a thin smoke plume rising from the hills under the lights. it did not appear to be a fire - the point-like lights were visible through the smoke, hovering no more than a few hundred feet above the hills. from that location approximately halfway between scoot and newport, the lights and smoke plume were visible above the hills to the southwest.

we considered that people may have been off-roading in the area, but the lights were not typical of how headlights appear at such a distance, they were just too bright and no movement was seen.

an unidentified helicopter (a frequent sighting in my area) was also seen over the neighborhoods along bradley rd in menifee while the lights were present to the southwest. instead of shining it's searchlight down at the streets (another frequent occurrence around here), the chopper was training its lights horizontally as if trying to spot something else in the air. we lost sight of the chopper and did not see it approach the area where the lights were visible.
content.summary: Pair of bright amber lights hovering over rural area
